snippet.title: Core Keeper - Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Grab your mining picks and get set for an enchanting underground adventure in Core Keeper, coming to Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PS5, and PS4 in summer 2024.

Explore an ancient cavern of creatures, treasures, and trinkets alone or online with friends in a 1-8 player mining sandbox adventure. Build your base, upgrade your tools and craft powerful equipment to defeat epic bosses. Farm crops, go fishing, cook new recipes, forage for items, explore diverse biomes and defeat legendary Titans solo or in up to 8-player co-op in a vast, procedurally-generated underground world.

The console versions of Core Keeper will launch simultaneously with the upcoming 1.0 update on PC, with more info to be revealed soon.

Core Keeper is available now on Steam Early Access.

Get Core Keeper on Steam: https://bit.ly/47pMkoe
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/corekeepergame
Join our Community on Discord: https://discord.gg/corekeeper  

©️2023 Pugstorm. Core Keeper is a trademark owned by Pugstorm. Developed by Pugstorm. Published by Fireshine Games.
